*div1 type="summary"* *p*Joshua Marsh to Austin, September 4, 1825. Concerning collections of debt. Status of slavery in Texas.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**person_mentioned*ESQR., OSTEN*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*After my best wishes for you and the settling of your *location_mentioned*cuntry */location_mentioned*and in which I wish to live sum day sooner or later God only willing—*/p*
*p*I have nothing interesting to write you the Death of *person_mentioned*Mr. Samuel Carter*/person_mentioned* who died at my *location_mentioned*house */location_mentioned*not long since after a few days of sickness of the Yallow Fevour as we though[t]—I delivered up his Vessel to the *location_mentioned*Cort of Probats*/location_mentioned* by the advice [of]*person_mentioned* Nathanil Cox murchant*/person_mentioned* of this place and She was sold according to sale and brough[t] the sum of $236 also his Trunk and Clothing in the year of *date_mentioned n="xx-xx-1812">1812 */date_mentioned*I sold to *person_mentioned*Mr. Carter*/person_mentioned* and *person_mentioned*Mr. McFurson*/person_mentioned* sum dry good and Whiskey Powder Cow and calf 1 large Bx sum hard ware in all the amount of $108 for which *person_mentioned*Mr. Carter Desest [deceased]*/person_mentioned* Promised to pay a few days befour his death as the note is Lost or miss lade it was my wish that the Slope of *person_mentioned*Mr. Carter */person_mentioned*would continued, to go to the *location_mentioned*Brasses */location_mentioned*but was not situated to purchase hir at the time of sale but wishes to incourage the settling of the *location_mentioned*Brasses */location_mentioned*and all the *location_mentioned*Cuntry*/location_mentioned*—*/p*
*p*I have lived in all 12 or 13 years and [have] for sum time past wished [to go to] *location_mentioned*Taxas */location_mentioned*I also have *person_mentioned*five Slaves */person_mentioned*wich I wish Should surve mei as long as I live and git more when Able—I am doing well in this place and Can make out to pay my honest Debts but would wish to bee in *location_mentioned*Taxas */location_mentioned*and their spend the balance of days— I have nothing new at present but will Conclude and remain your most obedient and Ever well wisher untill Death*/p*
*p**location_mentioned*New Orleans*/location_mentioned* *date_mentioned n="09-04-1825">Sept. 4th 1825*/date_mentioned**/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Joshua Marsh */person_mentioned* [Rubric]*/p*
*p*this was all known to *person_mentioned*Wm Fowlton [Fulton?]*/person_mentioned* who lived near us at the *location_mentioned*Post of Arkansas*/location_mentioned* *person_mentioned*Mr.—Charles McFurson*/person_mentioned* who marid a *person_mentioned*Miss Proctor of *location_mentioned*Ilinoy*/location_mentioned**/person_mentioned* I make no doubt but you knew them better than myself *person_mentioned*Mr. McFurson*/person_mentioned* is dead and insolven *person_mentioned*Debter */person_mentioned*altho a good man in my belief—and sent the Note to *person_mentioned*Thomas Levens*/person_mentioned* a *person_mentioned*Cousin */person_mentioned*of mine and hee sent it back, and inclosed and stating that nothing Could be had I also sent it to Mr. *person_mentioned*Hugh Skeel*/person_mentioned* at the *location_mentioned*Post of Arkansas*/location_mentioned* to try *person_mentioned*Mr. Carter*/person_mentioned* nothin to be had also *person_mentioned*Mr. Harris Wallace*/person_mentioned* and nothin found and the note is lost or miss laid and the first time that *person_mentioned*Mr. Carter*/person_mentioned* Came to this he come to my *location_mentioned*house */location_mentioned*and Promised that he would pay stock in the Taxes—I puit the Bill in the *location_mentioned*Parish Cort*/location_mentioned*—But received nothing I also will send a Coppy and hope that the *person_mentioned*Estate of Carter*/person_mentioned* will bee bound to pay the same.*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Joshua Marsh*/person_mentioned**/p*
*/div1*
